CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Civista Bancshares Inc is a financial holding company. Operating through its subsidiary, it engages in the business of community banking. Its business activity involves collecting customer deposits, making loans, purchasing securities, and offering trust services to its clients. The company's loan portfolio includes commercial and agriculture, commercial real estate-owner occupied, commercial real estate non-owner occupied, residential real estate, real estate construction, and consumer loans. Most of its revenues are derived from the interest and fees gained on loans.

value.name: Dennis G. Shaffer
value.title: Vice Chairman, President & Chief Executive Officer
